backend/main.mo: Defines core actor state, types, and data structures for BTC pricing, balances, transfers, withdrawals, reserve management, and admin authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented feature reports linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering routing, UI components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and light/dark OKLCH color tokens for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup with routing, authentication gate, admin guard, layout, and page registration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin privileges, with principal display, diagnostics, and retry options.
Loading screen for admin verification with elapsed timer, masked principal display, and retry/sign‑out actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Shows a warning card when a logged‑in user is not an admin, allowing them to copy their principal ID and retry the admin check.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoggedOutSi: Displays a centered login panel prompting users to sign in with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button handling Internet Identity auth, session clearing, and admin cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/balance/UsdEstim: Displays an estimated USD value for a BTC amount or a loading/unavailable state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, login button, admin access check, and user greeting, supporting mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, admin troubleshooting card injection, page content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminBro: Collapsible admin card explaining Bitcoin broadcast behavior and showing best‑practice guidance.
frontend/src/components/reserve/AdminRes: Admin panel polling and displaying reserve status, readiness checks, errors, and manual refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/reserve/BitcoinC: UI card showing a collapsible Python snippet for querying Bitcoin Core wallet balances, with alerts noting it must run externally and a copy-to-clipboard feature.
frontend/src/components/reserve/External: Displays an external Python monitoring script for mining pool earnings with warnings, collapsible UI, and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/reserve/ReserveM: Form-driven panel that loads, edits, and saves multisig configuration metadata, including threshold, pubkeys, address, and redeem script.
Shows a collapsible Python snippet for creating a multisig on Bitcoin Core, emphasizing it must run externally and allowing code copying.
frontend/src/components/transfers/bestPr: Provides structured best‑practice entries explaining common connectivity, provider, mempool, and network issues.
frontend/src/components/transfers/BestPr: Searchable and categorized best‑practices viewer that suggests relevant troubleshooting entries and renders them in an accordion.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Broadc: Collapsible UI note explaining how the app broadcasts Bitcoin transactions and warning users not to provide private keys.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Displays a sortable table of past transactions with type, date, amount, and actions including opening a verification dialog.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Dialog showing live status details for a transfer request with copy, refresh, and troubleshooting actions.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Admi: Admin table for viewing, approving, or rejecting withdrawal requests with copy and dialog controls.
Displays admin-level counts of pending, paid, and rejected withdrawal requests with styled status cards and conditional prompts.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/Exte: Provides collapsible developer notes with copyable code snippets for PayPal and Stripe payout API integrations.
frontend/src/components/withdrawals/With: Renders a sortable table of withdrawal requests with formatted timestamps, status badges, and method details.
Shows a user-facing summary of pending, paid, and rejected withdrawals, including guidance on what 'Paid' means.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiReserveMonitorin: Stores and syncs a boolean AI reserve monitoring preference using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useFundedWithdrawalNo: Monitors withdrawal status changes and triggers a toast when a request transitions from pending to paid.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including login, logout, and identity loading from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profile, balances, BTC operations, and reserve-related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, themes, and component utility classes including custom gradients and layout helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing React Query and wrapping the app with the InternetIdentityProvider.
Admin page displaying principal ID, balance with USD estimate, and a list of admin permissions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Comprehensive admin dashboard for managing BTC transfers, reserves, withdrawals, and monitoring system status.
frontend/src/pages/AiLotteryPage.tsx: Generates lottery number outcomes using recent draw data or a fallback dataset and displays results with status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Provides a form to submit Bitcoin transaction IDs to purchase credits and shows current balance with USD estimates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user balance, wallet info, recent transactions, and security notices with BTC/USD estimates.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows full transaction history with totals and optionally highlights a specific transfer using session-stored request IDs.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Presents placeholder UI for an upcoming puzzle rewards system with a notice that the feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Allows sending BTC credits, calculates fees, submits transfer requests, and shows success or failure outcomes with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/TransferTroubleshooti: UI page for inspecting and troubleshooting a specific BTC transfer request, including refreshing status, forcing re-analysis, and retrying broadcast.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Withdrawal form and history page allowing users to submit manual payout requests and view past requests, with balance checks and notifications.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: LocalStorage-based cache for storing per‑principal admin status with TTL and in‑memory verification tracking.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Functions that convert backend error messages into clearer, user‑friendly text for BTC transfers and reserve deposit validation.
frontend/src/utils/fundedNotificationSto: LocalStorage-backed store that tracks which withdrawal requests have already triggered PAID notifications for a principal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for BTC-credit handling, admin flows, and blockchain integration.
